comment: Since the property is a little lengthy, we abbreviate ` A e. CC /\ A =/= -u _i /\ A =/= _i ` as ` A e. dom arctan ` . This is the necessary precondition for the definition of ` arctan ` to make sense. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)
